actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Small Business
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to authorize loans to small business concerns which suffered economic injury as a result of the floating of the Mexican peso.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to authorize loans to small businesses which suffered economic injury as a result of the floating of the Mexican peso on or about September 1, 1976. Prohibits such loans to small businesses which suffered such economic injury as a result of a direct investment in the Mexican peso.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to authorize loans to small business concerns which suffered economic injury as a result of the floating of the Mexican peso.
